Supported Force Fields¶

MD¶

atoms.ff_lj(eps,sigma,r_c,shift=False) Lennard-Jones potential
atoms.ff_fs(A,t1,t2,k1,k2,k3,r_c_phi,r_c_rho) Finnis-Sinclair EAM
atoms.ff_eam_funcfl(funcfl_files) Tabulated EAM force field given by FuncFL file/s
atoms.ff_eam_setfl(setfl_file) Tabulated EAM force field given by a single SetFL file
atoms.ff_eam_fs(fs_file) Tabulated Finnis-Sinclair EAM

DMD¶

atoms.ff_eam_funcfl(funcfl_files) Tabulated EAM force field given by FuncFL file/s
atoms.ff_eam_setfl(setfl_file) Tabulated EAM force field given by a single SetFL file
atoms.ff_eam_fs(fs_file) Tabulated Finnis-Sinclair EAM
